title: Emails: Adding a Button Block
body:
Emails: Adding a Button Block¶

The Button block allows you to add a customizable interactive button to your email.
To use this block, you will need to have navigated to the email design tab. Click here if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Place a Button block in your email where desired

  2. Edit Button Text to change the text that appears on the button

  3. Select to link the button to an external page:

    • Web Address: Enter a web address

    • Form: Choose a form

    • Adjust Your Preferences: Opens page that allows recipients to adjust email preferences

    • Event: Add to Calendar: Choosing an upcoming event in your organization

    • Event: Registration: Choosing an upcoming event in your organization

  4. If desired, change the properties of the button under the Style tab

  5. By default, the button will span the width of the whole email. If desired, click Width and change the width to Fit to Text

  6. Click Done
